critique: This document concerns the termination of suspensions on punishment limitations for violations of Articles of War, specifically in occupied enemy territory. It's a legal and administrative action, so ideological tilt is not really applicable. Immigration is not relevant. Executive power is slightly reduced as it terminates previous expansions of power.
